author: smuzaffar
body:
As discussed https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33312, looks like these data files are not used any more. @ianna suggested to drop these. Later we can update cmsdist to drop the cms-data/DetectorDescription-Schema too.

Fixes cms-sw/cmssw#33312
title: Drop DetectorDescription/Schema package which just hold data files
